messages.title: A local champion fighting for us
messages.content: Local Councillor Lewis Bartoli is standing in the General Election to deliver real change for Monkseaton.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A clearer firm stance to improve our area's police presence.
More investment in our roads and to fix potholes.
More investment in the local NHS.

issues.health: More investment in the local NHS.

housing.content: More investment in our roads and to fix potholes.

leaflet.personalStatement: For over 20 years our area has been represented by the same Labour MP but in that time our services have failed to improve. Now is the time for change.

endorsements.endorsement: As a fellow North Tyneside Councillor, Lewis knows the issues which face here in Monkseaton, from roads and potholes to saving our green space.

images.caption: Cllr Lewis Bartoli with police and constituents.
Cllr Lewis Bartoli and Cllr Alison Austin on a street visit.
Cllr Lewis Bartoli with a dog.
